graph.topic: should all the advertisements be banned?

nodes.text: we can not overlook other merits the advertisements bring
it is unfair to restrict those public service advertisements which are creative and inspiring
they are not in the purpose of making profits but taking a role of disseminating valued culture, good moral traits and calling for helps for the disabled and the poor
publicizing brand image or a particular product of mass media could boost sales for companies
it could simulate household spending and therefore promote the economic development of the whole country
A recent study shows that after launching an advertising campaign, the sales revenue would increase by 40%, which is the very fact to verify its positive influences on economic
That is not to say, however, that advertisements have no downsides
the advertising expenses lead to a higher product price
some of them express fake information, creating information asymmetry between consumers and companies
its merits still outweigh these downsides
advertisements have its social responsibility and contribute to economic growth
if those with exaggerated and fake information could be banned, advertisements would be welcomed by more
